name: Jungle Jam - Juicy Fruit Match-3 Game
name_original: Jungle Jam - Juicy Fruit Match-3 Game
description:
Match and grow fruit in this juicy new match-3 adventure. Grown fruit explode, trigger chain reactions and create a Jungle Jam! Play through tons of challenges and become a fruit master!

JUNGLE JAM FEATURES:

- Completely free to play
- Unlock exciting new gameplay as you progress
- 200+ challenging levels
- Adventure into a fruity jungle
- Exploding fruit!

Download Jungle Jam now!
